text: Hey Taylor, I’m pretty sure this is a settings issue in the meetings tool; go to the meeting that module is using (Sales > Meetings from the nav bar) and then under scheduling > form > additional settings you’ll find options to prefill known fields and/or auto-submit if all forms are present.
Thank you, Mark! I will look at this today.

Hey Mark, so that setting pre-populates the form after someone has chosen the date and time they want (which is this screen attached). What action I'm looking for is pre-populating the immediate screen on the thank you page, before one even sees the calendar, which this setting does not do.

Here is what I tried doing in the meetings scheduler code, and couldn't get it to work: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Pre-populate-meetings-embedded-widget/m-p/239951/thread-id/18847>
Hi, how do I make an image width: 100% and height: auto when using the "dnd_module path='@HubSpot/image'"? In the documentation I only see parameters for fixed width and height.

Does anyone else here have an API product that they charge per API call? In the app submission form it only allows 2 decimal places when providing pricing information for the app... does anyone here have the same issue with providing pricing for API pay-as-you-go models???
Not all pay-as-you-go pricing models start from $0.01....
